Class Planet

java.lang.Object
Ball
Planet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Moon
public class Planet
extends Ball
Extends Ball class to define the more specific type, planet
Author:
Konnor Sommer
